TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IImplicitResourceProvider

summary.span: 定義類別 (Class) 實作的方法，用來做為隱含資源提供者。

span.span: Defines methods a class implements to act as an implicit resource provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源可以明確或隱含地宣告在網頁內。Resources can be declared explicitly or implicitly within a page. 隱含的資源可讓開發人員將資源值的集合指派至一個陳述式，而非個別指定每個值的控制項。Implicit resources allow the developer to assign a collection of resource values to a control in one statement rather than assigning each value individually. 當頁面剖析器遇到隱含資源的形式`meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`，它會將指派的值與`WelcomeLabel`資源控制項中的對應值的索引鍵前置詞。When the page parser encounters an implicit resource in the form of `meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`, it assigns all the values with the `WelcomeLabel` resource key prefix to the corresponding values in the control. 例如，如果資源檔中定義的值`WelcomeLabel.Text`和`WelcomeLabel.ToolTip`，這些值會指派給`Label`控制項的隱含參考`WelcomeLabel`。For example, if a resource file defines values for `WelcomeLabel.Text` and `WelcomeLabel.ToolTip`, those values would be assigned to a `Label` control with an implicit reference to `WelcomeLabel`. 介面會定義存取隱含資源的資源提供者實作的方法。The interface defines the methods a resource provider implements to access implicit resources. 您可以取得特定的值，使用方法。You can obtain a particular value using the method. 如果您建立自訂資源提供者，您不需要提供自訂的支援隱含資源當地語系化。If you create a custom resource provider, you do not need to provide customized support for implicit resource localization. 隱含當地語系化將適用於您的資源提供者。Implicit localization will work with your resource provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ICollection GetImplicitResourceKeys(string keyPrefix) cil managed
Public Function GetImplicitResourceKeys (keyPrefix As String) As ICollection

param.name: keyPrefix
param.span: 要收集的隱含資源索引鍵之前置詞。

span.span: The prefix of the implicit resource keys to be collected.

summary.span: 取得依照前置詞指定的隱含資源索引鍵集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of implicit resource keys as specified by the prefix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作時，此方法會傳回隱含資源特定前置詞的索引鍵的集合。When implemented, the method returns a collection of implicit resource keys for a particular prefix. 例如，`WelcomeLabel`指定運算式中的前置詞為`meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`。For example, `WelcomeLabel` is specified as the prefix in the expression `meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`. 本機資源檔中的任何屬性`WelcomeLabel`前置詞應該傳回此方法。Any properties in a local resource file with `WelcomeLabel` as a prefix should be returned with this method.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetObject (System.Web.Compilation.ImplicitResourceKey key, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetObject(class System.Web.Compilation.ImplicitResourceKey key, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed
Public Function GetObject (key As ImplicitResourceKey, culture As CultureInfo) As Object

param.name: key
param.span: 資源索引鍵包含前置詞、篩選條件和屬性。

span.span: The resource key containing the prefix, filter, and property.

param.name: culture
param.span: ，表示資源要當地語系化的文化特性 (Culture)。

span.span: The that represents the culture for which the resource is localized.

summary.span: 取得物件，表示指定資源索引鍵的值。

span.span: Gets an object representing the value of the specified resource key.

returns.span: ，表示隱含資源索引鍵的當地語系化值。

span.span: An representing the localized value of an implicit resource key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作時，方法會傳回隱含資源索引鍵所表示之值的物件。When implemented, the method returns the object for the value represented by the implicit resource key.
